content.rendered: Four Corners Group will host Orientations at our two Cobb County locations for our 10-week Pathways to Success youth program this month on January 16th (Austell) and January 18th (Marietta/Kennesaw). Pathways to Success is a youth leadership program focusing on life skills, character development, job readiness and more. During the 10 weeks, students will work with trained facilitators and coaches to gain assets that will help them succeed and thrive in life. For more info, and to register today, please visit: fourcornersgroup.net/pathways!
